text: Giuliana Calandra (10 February 1936 â€“ 25 November 2018) was an Italian actress, journalist and television presenter. She was born in Moncalieri, Italy. Calandra was known for her movie roles in La Calandria, Deep Red and in L'affittacamere. Calandra died in Aprilia, Lazio on 25 November 2018 from leukemia at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian journalists Category:20th-century Italian writers Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors
title: Giuliana Calandra
